data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Mon, Myanmar (Burma) to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mon, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Mon, Myanmar (Burma) need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 20 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 123,519 believers in Mon to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 123,519 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Hui, Muslim Chinese people.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Mon to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Mon that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mon, Myanmar (Burma) has a population of 2,535,600.

We estimate Mon has 123,519 people who might know Jesus, 83,445 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,328,636 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Mon access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Mon
location.people_groups_list: Hindi, Punjabi, Karen, Pwo Eastern, Tamil (Hindu traditions), Han Chinese, Min Nan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hindi (131,000), Punjabi (11,000), Karen, Pwo Eastern (1,169,000), Tamil (Hindu traditions) (149,000), Han Chinese, Min Nan (72,000)
